description: This file defines a custom React hook `useFocusNav` that provides keyboard navigation (arrow keys and Enter/ESC) among focusable elements within a container, facilitating accessible keyboard controls for UI navigation.

methods.name: isFocusable(el)
methods.description: Determines if an element is focusable based on its tag or attributes.

methods.name: useFocusNav(containerRef, options = {})
methods.description: Main hook enabling arrow key navigation within a referenced container, with configurable selectors and event handling.

methods.name: getFocusables
methods.description: Retrieves a list of focusable child elements matching the specified selector.

methods.name: focusIndex
methods.description: Focuses the element at the specified index within focusable elements.

methods.name: move
methods.description: Moves focus to the next or previous focusable element based on direction.
